column1: '''''Mallorn'' 12''' is the twelfth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s annual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)
The issue includes a review "Opinion of Priscilla Tolkien on The Biography" (pp. 5-6) and a reprint of J.R.R. Tolkien's early poem "[[The Battle of the Eastern Field]]" (pp. 24-28).<ref>{{webcite
